text: ab usase badhakar atyaachaaree kaun hai, jisane allaah par mithyaaropan kiya ya usakee aayaton ko jhuthalaaya? aise logon ko unake lie likha hua hissa pahunchata rahega, yahaan tak ki jab hamaare bheje hue (farishte) unake praan grast karane ke lie unake paas aaenge to kahenge, "kahaan hain, ve jinhen tum allaah ko chhodakar pukaarate the?" kahenge, "ve to hamase gum ho gae." aur ve svayan apane viruddh gavaahee denge ki vaastav mein ve inakaar karanevaale the
